Runtime.Architecture: DDD + Hexagonal; domain/application free of Spring/JPA dependencies.

Database.Rules: Disable Open-Session-in-View; equals/hashCode by business key; optimistic locking with @Version.

Cache.Usage: Cache product lists/detail, with cache-busting on publish.

Messaging.Pattern: Transactional outbox for publishing; idempotent consumers.

Media.ServiceRef: media-service for asset validation and signed URLs

Security.Auth: OAuth2/OIDC JWT; roles CATALOG_ADMIN/CONTENT_EDITOR for write; SERVICE/BUYER for read.
Security.Validation: Bean Validation on DTOs; domain invariants checked in domain layer.

Observability.Metrics: Micrometer + Prometheus; business metrics: publish count, read latency, cache hit rate.
Observability.Tracing: OpenTelemetry propagation via gateway; include productId/version in spans.
Observability.Logging: Structured JSON with block anchors (PROD-PRICE-*, PROD-PUB-*) for belief-state tracing.

Resilience.Timeouts: Media lookups and search indexing bounded with timeouts.
Resilience.Retries: Circuit breakers and retries for transient DB/cache/broker issues; idempotent handlers.

Testing.Contract: OpenAPI contract tests; AsyncAPI/Avro for events
Testing.Architecture: ArchUnit enforcing hexagonal boundaries and shared-kernel purity
